name: Cube Shooter (GameDevSimplified)
description:
Cubes have taken over the world. You are a triangle, teaming up with spheres in order to take everything back. This game contains 5 levels and a win screen. Every level introduces new mechanics and it becomes harder over time. I made this game with a time limit to challenge myself. I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it!

GameDevSimplified
